text:
*[Bug 18848] New: libpq missing ldap support*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18848>

            Bug ID: 18848
           Summary: libpq missing ldap support
           Product: Rtools
           Version: 4.4
          Hardware: Other
                OS: Other
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: normal
          Priority: P5
         Component: Toolchain and libraries
          Assignee: <mailto:tomas.kalibera@gmail.com|tomas.kalibera@gmail.com>
          Reporter: <mailto:jeroenooms@gmail.com|jeroenooms@gmail.com>

The current build of libpq disables LDAP:

    --without-ldap

However many Windows users rely on this form of authentication (even though we
cannot easily capture this in a generic unit test).
